General.Name: Syncmold Enterprise Corp
General.Description: Syncmold Enterprise Corp. engages in the processing, manufacturing, trading, technology licensing, and import and export of various metal molds, plastic molds, and electronic parts in Taiwan. It offers stands and hinges; and injection and molding products. The company also manufactures plastic injection molds; magnesium alloy die casters; and plastic shots and hardware components. In addition, it engages in manufacturing and assembling laptop components, such as precision bearing, hardware, and related accessories. The company was formerly known as Syncmold Ltd. and changed its name to Syncmold Enterprise Corp. in 1988. Syncmold Enterprise Corp. was incorporated in 1979 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 168, Jiankang Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan

1.Name: Yahui  Zhang
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. of Investment & Corp. Information Division
